name: docker
description: A test package to setup a docker environment with separate frontend and backend apps.

scripts.test: npm run-script start-dev && (cd docker-node && npm test)
scripts.build: (cd docker-react && npm run-script build-prod) && (cd docker-node && npm run-script build-prod) && (cd docker-mongo && npm run-script build-prod)
scripts.publish: (cd docker-node && docker push aido179/docker-node-boilerplate:test) && (cd docker-react && docker push aido179/docker-react-boilerplate:test) && (cd docker-mongo && docker push aido179/docker-mongo-boilerplate:test)
scripts.start: docker swarm init && docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml docker-boilerplate
scripts.start-prod: npm run-script build && npm run-script publish && npm start
scripts.stop-prod: docker stack rm docker-boilerplate && docker swarm leave --force
scripts.start-dev: (cd docker-node && npm start) && (cd docker-mongo && npm start) && (cd docker-react && npm start)
scripts.stop-dev: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all

author: Aidan Breen
